264.delay~.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a simple delay line interface.

264.sfplay~.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a simple soundfile player.

264.sfrecord~.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a monophonic soundfile recorder.

264.filter~.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a highpass, lowpass, or bandpass filter.

264.grains~.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a live audio granulation module.

264.envelope~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to convert audio to a control envelope.

264.ringmod~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to modulate audio with a single oscillator.

264.reverb~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to apply reverb to audio.

264.transpose~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to pitch shift audio by semitones.

264.pitchtrack~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to analyse fundamental frequencies.

264.trigger~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to detect attacks.

264.freeze~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to apply a spectral freeze to incoming audio.

264.audiotest~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to provide basic audio status testing.

264.limit~.digest: Use to limit your audio signalâ€™s and avoid clipping.

264.loop~.digest: Use in a bpatcher to record and manipulate audio loops.

264.midi-learn.digest: Use in a bpatcher to quickly map MIDI controls in Max.

264.key-learn.digest: Use in a bpatcher to quickly map keyboard shortcuts in Max.

264.audio-presets.digest: Use in a bpatcher to store parameter presets in 264 Tools modules.

264.midi-presets.digest: Use in a bpatcher to store mappings of 264.midi-learn.

264.tog.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a MIDI-ready toggle.

264.go!.digest: Use in a bpatcher for a MIDI-ready button.

264.fullscreen.digest: Use in a bpatcher to easily toggle fullscreen display.

264.lockstatus.digest: Find out if the patcher is currently locked or not.
